channel.title: Mastermind Day Ability: Promote
channel.description:
Dirty Work is a very niche ability, only used in situations when there are almost no converts left and killing becomes more reliable than converting. HOWEVER, this still hinders the progress of the Unseen greatly, and most of the time, you would prefer there to be a Mastermind than an Assassin. So I propose that this ability, Promote, should also be given to the Mastermind, as most cases where Mastermind dies or is kept in jail and such, for people waiting for it to become Day 4. Swapping the class of Mastermind helps for Unseen to live longer, and not rely as a crutch on the Mastermind. But it's not an auto-upgrade like Cult, so it won't always be usable.
Promote: (D) (2) (Uses carry over to succeeding Masterminds) If you and an Assassin is alive at the start of the night, you will swap classes with the Assassin. The Assassin will be notified when this is used.
